trans-unit.source: Enables the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server to help make sure that a user has a security level sufficient to access a data source.
trans-unit.target: 启用.NET Framework 数据提供程序以帮助确保用户具有足够权限来访问数据源的安全级别的 SQL Server。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> property takes precedence over the <xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataPermission.AllowBlankPassword%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>属性优先于<xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataPermission.AllowBlankPassword%2A>属性。</xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataPermission.AllowBlankPassword%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if you set <xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataPermission.AllowBlankPassword%2A> to `false`, you must also set <xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `false` to prevent a user from making a connection using a blank password.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果你设置<xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataPermission.AllowBlankPassword%2A>到`false`，还必须设置<xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>到`false`以防止用户进行使用空密码的连接。</xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataPermission.AllowBlankPassword%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When using code access security permissions for ADO.NET, the correct pattern is to start with the most restrictive case (no permissions at all) and then add the specific permissions that are needed for the particular task that the code needs to perform.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时使用的 ADO.NET 代码访问安全性权限，正确的模式是以限制性最强的情况 （无任何权限） 开始，然后添加该代码需要执行的特定任务所需的特定权限。

trans-unit.source: The opposite pattern, starting with all permissions and then denying a specific permission, is not secure, because there are many ways of expressing the same connection string.
trans-unit.target: 相反的模式，开始具有所有权限，然后拒绝特定权限，并不安全，因为有多种方法表达同一连接字符串中。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you start with all permissions and then attempt to deny the use of the connection string "server=someserver", the string "server=someserver.mycompany.com" would still be allowed.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果开始具有所有权限，然后尝试拒绝使用连接字符串"server = someserver"，就仍允许一的字符串。

trans-unit.source: By always starting by granting no permissions at all, you reduce the chances that there are holes in the permission set.
trans-unit.target: 通过开始始终不授予任何权限，可以减少权限集中存在漏洞的几率。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> enumeration takes precedence over the <xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataPermission.AllowBlankPassword%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>枚举将优先于<xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataPermission.AllowBlankPassword%2A>属性。</xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataPermission.AllowBlankPassword%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if you set <xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataPermission.AllowBlankPassword%2A> to `false`, you must also set <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> to `None` to prevent a user from making a connection using a blank password.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果你设置<xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataPermission.AllowBlankPassword%2A>到`false`，还必须设置<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>到`None`以防止用户进行使用空密码的连接。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataPermission.AllowBlankPassword%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example demonstrating how to use security demands, see [Code Access Security and ADO.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何使用安全要求的示例，请参阅[代码访问安全性和 ADO.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a blank password is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否允许密码为空。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new connection string and a set of restricted keywords to the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 添加新的连接字符串和一组受限制的关键字，到<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to configure which connection strings are allowed by a particular permission object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于配置特定的权限对象允许的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: For example, use the following code fragment if you want to only allow a specific connection string and nothing else: `permission.Add("server=MyServer; database=MyDatabase; Integrated Security=true", "", KeyRestrictionBehavior.AllowOnly)` The following example allows connection strings that use any database, but only on the server named MyServer, with any user and password combination and containing no other connection string keywords: `permission.Add("server=MyServer;", "database=; user id=; password=;", KeyRestrictionBehavior.AllowOnly)` The following example uses the same scenario as above but allows for a failover partner that can be used when connecting to servers configured for mirroring: `permission.Add("server=MyServer; failover partner=MyMirrorServer", "database=; user id=; password=;", KeyRestrictionBehavior.AllowOnly)` > [!NOTE] > When using code access security permissions for ADO.NET, the correct pattern is to start with the most restrictive case (no permissions at all) and then add the specific permissions that are needed for the particular task that the code needs to perform.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要仅允许特定连接字符串和其他任何内容，例如，使用下面的代码片段︰`permission.Add("server=MyServer; database=MyDatabase; Integrated Security=true", "", KeyRestrictionBehavior.AllowOnly)`下面的示例允许使用任何数据库，但只能在名为 MyServer，任何用户和密码组合，它包含任何其他连接字符串关键字的服务器的连接字符串︰`permission.Add("server=MyServer;", "database=; user id=; password=;", KeyRestrictionBehavior.AllowOnly)`下面的示例按上面所述使用相同的方案，但允许的可用于连接到服务器配置时镜像故障转移合作伙伴: `permission.Add("server=MyServer; failover partner=MyMirrorServer", "database=; user id=; password=;", KeyRestrictionBehavior.AllowOnly)` > [!NOTE]&1;> 时使用的 ADO.NET 代码访问安全性权限，正确的模式是以限制性最强的情况 （无任何权限） 开始，然后添加该代码需要执行的特定任务所需的特定权限。

trans-unit.source: The opposite pattern, starting with all permissions and then trying to deny a specific permission, is not secure, because there are many ways of expressing the same connection string.
trans-unit.target: 相反的模式，开始具有所有权限，然后尝试拒绝特定权限，是不安全，因为有许多方式表达同一连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you start with all permissions and then attempt to deny the use of the connection string "server=someserver", the string "server=someserver.mycompany.com" would still be allowed.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果开始具有所有权限，然后尝试拒绝使用连接字符串"server = someserver"，就仍允许一的字符串。

trans-unit.source: By always starting by granting no permissions at all, you reduce the chances that there are holes in the permission set.
trans-unit.target: 通过开始始终不授予任何权限，可以减少权限集中存在漏洞的几率。

trans-unit.source: The connection string.
trans-unit.target: 连接字符串中。

trans-unit.source: The key restrictions.
trans-unit.target: 键的限制。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.KeyRestrictionBehavior"></xref> enumerations.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Data.KeyRestrictionBehavior"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"></xref> as an <xref href="System.Security.IPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returns the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"></xref> as an <xref href="System.Security.IPermission"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current permission object.
trans-unit.target: 当前权限对象的副本。
